83 enum UpdateFlags
84 {
86  update_default = 0,
88 
95  update_values = 0x0001,
97 
101  update_gradients = 0x0002,
103 
107  update_hessians = 0x0004,
109 
114  update_boundary_forms = 0x0008,
116 
119  update_quadrature_points = 0x0010,
121 
126  update_JxW_values = 0x0020,
128 
133  update_normal_vectors = 0x0040,
137  update_face_normal_vectors = update_normal_vectors,
141  update_cell_normal_vectors = update_normal_vectors,
143 
147  update_jacobians = 0x0080,
149 
152  update_jacobian_grads = 0x0100,
154 
158  update_inverse_jacobians = 0x0200,
160 
165  update_covariant_transformation = 0x0400,
167 
172  update_contravariant_transformation = 0x0800,
174 
178  update_transformation_values = 0x1000,
180 
184  update_transformation_gradients = 0x2000,
186 
189  update_volume_elements = 0x4000,
193  update_support_points = 0x10000,
197  update_support_jacobians = 0x20000,
202  update_support_inverse_jacobians = 0x40000,
206  update_q_points = update_quadrature_points,
210  update_second_derivatives = update_hessians,
212 
215  update_piola = update_volume_elements | update_contravariant_transformation
216 };
217 
218 
224 template <class STREAM>
225 inline
226 STREAM &operator << (STREAM &s, UpdateFlags u)
227 {
228  s << " UpdateFlags|";
229  if (u & update_values) s << "values|";
230  if (u & update_gradients) s << "gradients|";
231  if (u & update_hessians) s << "hessians|";
232  if (u & update_quadrature_points) s << "quadrature_points|";
233  if (u & update_JxW_values) s << "JxW_values|";
234  if (u & update_normal_vectors) s << "normal_vectors|";
235  if (u & update_jacobians) s << "jacobians|";
236  if (u & update_inverse_jacobians) s << "inverse_jacobians|";
237  if (u & update_jacobian_grads) s << "jacobian_grads|";
238  if (u & update_covariant_transformation) s << "covariant_transformation|";
239  if (u & update_contravariant_transformation) s << "contravariant_transformation|";
240  if (u & update_transformation_values) s << "transformation_values|";
241  if (u & update_transformation_gradients) s << "transformation_gradients|";
242  if (u & update_support_points) s << "support_points|";
243  if (u & update_support_jacobians) s << "support_jacobians|";
244  if (u & update_support_inverse_jacobians) s << "support_inverse_jacobians|";
245 
246 //TODO: check that 'u' really only has the flags set that are handled above
247  return s;
248 }

250 
261 inline
262 UpdateFlags
263 operator | (UpdateFlags f1, UpdateFlags f2)
264 {
265  return static_cast<UpdateFlags> (
266  static_cast<unsigned int> (f1) |
267  static_cast<unsigned int> (f2));
268 }
269 
270 
271 
272 
279 inline
280 UpdateFlags &
281 operator |= (UpdateFlags &f1, UpdateFlags f2)
282 {
283  f1 = f1 | f2;
284  return f1;
285 }
286 
287 
298 inline
299 UpdateFlags
300 operator & (UpdateFlags f1, UpdateFlags f2)
301 {
302  return static_cast<UpdateFlags> (
303  static_cast<unsigned int> (f1) &
304  static_cast<unsigned int> (f2));
305 }
306 
307 
314 inline
315 UpdateFlags &
316 operator &= (UpdateFlags &f1, UpdateFlags f2)
317 {
318  f1 = f1 & f2;
319  return f1;
320 }
